descriptionHtml:
Description

This mod was created for the purpose of having a full 4 woman team of Nightingales. These 4 related individuals are giving up their lives to protect & Serve Nocturnal in both life and death. 

Installation

Easy & Simple: All you have to do is either copy & paste the file you get from this download and put it into the data folder in your Skyrim directory and make sure that the mod is active before launching the game. You can do this by using the TESV.exe to open the home screen of Skyrim and opening Data Files and making sure that the Nightingales_Team.esp is checked.

Uninstallation

You can uninstall the mod by deleting the Nightingales_Team.esp file from your data folder in your Skyrim directory. 

Location

The location of this mod is rather simple. These NPCs can be found inside Hjerim in Windhelm. It would be better if you owned the house before activating this mod. 

Other Notes

If you have any questions or ideas for mods, please, feel free to send me a message. 

Thanks List

Deapri
Wafflesalot

I have thanked these members for the amount of motivation they have given me. ;)

If I forgot to mention you, please do not be upset. I will see you around! ;)
author: Kronica
